name: Find the Hidden Toy Games
description:
Easy awesome fun & hit game in Toys style! Let's free to fun with!!!!

##GAME FEATURES##
- Find and explore object in time The faster the score, the faster.
- 100+ of cute characters to find.
- Choose the challenge in simple easy to difficult game to your challenge.
- Colorful and realistic images with cute graphics.
- Suitable for learning to separate the various.
- Recommended system if you find the picture is not easy to play.
- The sound of a beautiful bright relaxing.
